description.author: Ryan Trinkle
description.description: Reflex is a high-performance, deterministic, higher-order Functional Reactive Programming system

package-flags.name: use-reflex-optimizer
package-flags.description: Use the GHC plugin Reflex.Optimizer on some of the modules in the package.  This is still experimental.

package-flags.name: use-template-haskell
package-flags.description: Use template haskell to generate lenses

package-flags.name: debug-trace-events
package-flags.description: Add instrumentation that outputs the stack trace of the definition of an event whenever it is subscribed to. Warning: It is very slow!

package-flags.name: fast-weak
package-flags.description: Use the primitive implementation of FastWeak in GHCJS; note that this requires GHCJS to be built with FastWeak and FastWeakBag present in the RTS, which is not the default
